divs: Sighting DetailsI was smoking a cigarette when I first noticed the lights. I was looking at the star when I saw two lights that seemed so far away to appear star like but definitely within the atmosphere. I studied the object and determined they were UFO's. They were two glowing lights orange in color. They would move toward each other in a straight line then move apart. They did this continually for the entire time observed. I felt amazed, it seems I somehow always get what I ask for as I have wanted to see a UFO for the longest. I stopped observing the object because I was told by the police to go home as there have been an increase in home robberies by my house.
Summary: Two orange lights would move toward each other then away then back for entire time observed.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around April 23rd 2013
